p: To evaluate the preventive effect of Radix isatidis polysaccharide on PRV infection, porcine testicle cells were first co-cultured with different concentrations of Radix isatidis polysaccharide, which was followed by infection with PRV. Results showed that this treatment could prevent PRV infection at rates ranging from 6.668 to 14.923% (Fig.Â 2).
